languages.text: "Даже те, кто взошел к мудрости Омниссии, продолжают нести в себе зерно несовершенства, рождаемое плотью. Но амбиции отдельно взятых индивидов малозначимы, когда дискуссия идет о вере и ритуале. Знание божественно, и всякий спор о том, как надлежит прикасаться к нему — это спор духа и веры".

traits.locale_text: "Даже те, кто взошел к мудрости Омниссии, продолжают нести в себе зерно несовершенства, рождаемое плотью. Но амбиции отдельно взятых индивидов малозначимы, когда дискуссия идет о вере и ритуале. Знание божественно, и всякий спор о том, как надлежит прикасаться к нему — это спор духа и веры".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Even those who have ascended to the Omnissiah's wisdom still bear the seed of imperfection born of their flesh. But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."
languages.original_text: "Даже те, кто взошел к мудрости Омниссии, продолжают нести в себе зерно несовершенства, рождаемое плотью. Но амбиции отдельно взятых индивидов малозначимы, когда дискуссия идет о вере и ритуале. Знание божественно, и всякий спор о том, как надлежит прикасаться к нему — это спор духа и веры".

But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as how to it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as how to it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

traits.locale_text: "Even those who have ascended to the Omnissiah's wisdom still bear the seed of imperfection born of their flesh. But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “即便是那些已经得到欧姆尼塞亚智慧的人，也依然带着由肉体中诞生的缺陷种子。不过，当我们讨论仪式与信仰时，个人的野心并不重要。知识是神圣的，任何关于如何获得知识的辩论，都会是关于仪式与信仰的辩论。”
languages.original_text: "Even those who have ascended to the Omnissiah's wisdom still bear the seed of imperfection born of their flesh. But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

traits.locale_text: “即便是那些已经得到欧姆尼塞亚智慧的人，也依然带着由肉体中诞生的缺陷种子。不过，当我们讨论仪式与信仰时，个人的野心并不重要。知识是神圣的，任何关于如何获得知识的辩论，都会是关于仪式与信仰的辩论。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Incluso quienes ascienden a la perfección del Omnissiah siguen llevando la semilla de la imperfección en su carne. Pero las ambiciones de los individuos no significan gran cosa al hablar de rituales y creencias. El conocimiento es divino y cualquier discusión sobre cómo alcanzarlo es un debate basado precisamente en eso, en rituales y creencias».
languages.original_text: "Even those who have ascended to the Omnissiah's wisdom still bear the seed of imperfection born of their flesh. But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso quienes ascienden a la perfección del Omnissiah siguen llevando la semilla de la imperfección en su carne. Pero las ambiciones de los individuos no significan gran cosa al hablar de rituales y creencias. El conocimiento es divino y cualquier discusión sobre cómo alcanzarlo es un debate basado precisamente en eso, en rituales y creencias».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「万機神の叡智に昇った者でさえ、肉から生まれた不完全さの種をまだ持っている。しかし、儀式と信仰について議論するとき、個人の野心はほとんど意味をなさない。知識は神的なものであり、どのようにしてそれに到達しなければならないかというあらゆる議論は、儀式と信念の議論なのだ」
languages.original_text: "Even those who have ascended to the Omnissiah's wisdom still bear the seed of imperfection born of their flesh. But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の叡智に昇った者でさえ、肉から生まれた不完全さの種をまだ持っている。しかし、儀式と信仰について議論するとき、個人の野心はほとんど意味をなさない。知識は神的なものであり、どのようにしてそれに到達しなければならないかというあらゆる議論は、儀式と信念の議論なのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Selbst jene, die zur Weisheit des Omnissiah aufgestiegen sind, tragen noch die Saat der Unvollkommenheit in sich, die aus ihrem Fleisch geboren wurde. Doch die Ambitionen des Einzelnen sind unbedeutend, wenn wir über Ritual und Glaube sprechen. Wissen ist göttlich, und jedes Argument, wie man es erreichen muss, ist ein Argument des Rituals und der Überzeugung."
languages.original_text: "Even those who have ascended to the Omnissiah's wisdom still bear the seed of imperfection born of their flesh. But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst jene, die zur Weisheit des Omnissiah aufgestiegen sind, tragen noch die Saat der Unvollkommenheit in sich, die aus ihrem Fleisch geboren wurde. Doch die Ambitionen des Einzelnen sind unbedeutend, wenn wir über Ritual und Glaube sprechen. Wissen ist göttlich, und jedes Argument, wie man es erreichen muss, ist ein Argument des Rituals und der Überzeugung."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Même ceux qui ont atteint la sagesse de l'Omnimessie continuent de porter la graine de l'imperfection née de leur chair. Cependant, les ambitions individuelles importent peu lorsque l'on parle de rituel et de croyance. Puisque la connaissance est divine, tout argument quant à la manière de l'atteindre est un argument de rituel et de croyance. »
languages.original_text: "Even those who have ascended to the Omnissiah's wisdom still bear the seed of imperfection born of their flesh. But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

traits.locale_text: « Même ceux qui ont atteint la sagesse de l'Omnimessie continuent de porter la graine de l'imperfection née de leur chair. Cependant, les ambitions individuelles importent peu lorsque l'on parle de rituel et de croyance. Puisque la connaissance est divine, tout argument quant à la manière de l'atteindre est un argument de rituel et de croyance. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Even those who have ascended to the Omnissiah's wisdom still bear the seed of imperfection born of their flesh. But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

languages.text: "Hermesih'in bahşettiği bilgeliğe erişenler bile içinde doğdukları bedenden kaynaklı kusurlar taşır. Söz konusu ayinler ve inançlar olduğunda bireylerin tutkuları, fazla bir şey ifade etmez. İrfan kutsaldır ve ona nasıl ulaşılabileceğine dair her tür argüman, ayin ve inanç üzerinedir."
languages.original_text: "Even those who have ascended to the Omnissiah's wisdom still bear the seed of imperfection born of their flesh. But the ambitions of individuals mean little when we discuss ritual and belief. Knowledge is divine, and any argument as to how it must be reached is an argument of ritual and belief."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'in bahşettiği bilgeliğe erişenler bile, içinde doğdukları bedenden kaynaklı kusurlar taşırlar. Bireylerin tutkuları, ayinlerden ve inançlardan konuşuyorsak, fazla anlam ifade etmezler ama. İrfan kutsaldır ve ona nasıl ulaşılabileceğine dair her tür argüman da ayinler ve inanç hakkındadır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
